intro: Schaueria marginata, commonly known as the marginated schaueria, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the family Aizoaceae, commonly referred to as the ice plant family. It thrives in arid and semi-arid environments, adapting to harsh conditions with its water-storing tissues. Schaueria marginata is often grown as an ornamental plant due to its unique appearance and drought tolerance.
